resources.string: LVCC is committed to provide quality education at pace with the changing times while imparting wisdom based on biblical truth to communities.
The institution that ensures quality learning and Biblical moral standards.
To be the front runner in providing academic excellence and morally upright principles.

I. PRE-SCHOOL (with pay)
II. Grade 1 - Grade 10
III. CHED Program: a. 5 - Year Bachelor of Science in Accountancy b. 4 - Year Bachelor of Science in Accounting Technology c. 4 - Year Bachelor of Arts in Broadcasting d. 4 - Year Bachelor of Science in Information System e. 2 - Year Associate in Computer Technology
IV. TESDA Program: a. Mass Communication Technology b. Health Care Services c. Office Management d. Cookery
